title: Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policy, and Cookies Policy
lastUpdatedText: Always in effect unless explicitly updated.

userDefinition.title: 1.1 Definition of "User"
userDefinition.content: "User" means "Client", "you", "your" or any other terminology that refers to the individual accessing Drishiq's website/app or interacting with the services provided. For individuals below the age of 18, the term also includes the Legal Guardian/Parent who must provide explicit consent and oversight for the user to access Drishiq. Taking this approval is user's responsibility. By using the platform, you confirm you are of legal age (18+), and in the case of teens, that consent has been granted by a parent/guardian.

natureOfServices.title: 1.2 Nature of Services
natureOfServices.content1: Drishiq is an AI-powered assistant platform designed to clarify user challenges through structured inquiry and problem mapping. It does not offer medical, psychiatric, legal, financial, or emergency intervention of any kind.
natureOfServices.content2: This is a diagnostic tool to help individuals better understand their problem through structured inquiry and stakeholder expectation mapping. Solving the problem involves multiple variables—such as user intention, capability, financial and health condition—which may limit the platform's ability to produce perfect solutions. It is not intended to replace qualified human judgment or professional services.

aiDisclosure.title: 1.3 AI Use Disclosure (Transparency & Limits)
aiDisclosure.content: All responses are generated by artificial intelligence and may not always reflect factual accuracy or human judgment. Users are advised to interpret responses with discretion. We acknowledge the limitations of AI, including hallucinations, contextual misinterpretations, and system bias. Users are encouraged to double-check any information that might influence critical decisions.

generalDisclaimer.title: 1.4 General Disclaimer
generalDisclaimer.content: Drishiq does not deal with any medical, psychological, or psychiatric emergencies. If you or anyone you know is feeling suicidal, experiencing self-harm tendencies, or showing symptoms of serious clinical disorders, please seek immediate help from a medical professional or the nearest emergency service. The platform is not suitable for crisis intervention or emergency medical needs.

disclaimerBox.label: Disclaimer:
disclaimerBox.content: The content/information provided in any diagnostic session, suggestion, or guidance from Drishiq has not been evaluated or certified by any regulatory authority. All materials and responses are provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranty, express or implied.

userExpectation.title: 1.5 User Expectation Management Clause
userExpectation.content1: The platform is exploratory in nature. If a user's expectations are not met, they acknowledge that suggestions are not commitments or promises. No entitlement to outcomes, refunds, or results is implied.
userExpectation.content2: Drishiq encourages users to report cases where the diagnostic understanding appears off-target. If, upon review, the issue is found to be genuine, Drishiq may refund the session charge or restore one session credit to the user's subscription.

sessionCharges.title: 1.6 Session Charges & Scope
sessionCharges.content: Each paid session covers one distinct problem statement. Two different issues cannot be merged into one session.

points.point1: A session begins when a user submits a query.
points.point2: Once a question is asked, users may not change the topic mid-session.
points.point3: A session is considered completed if Drishiq provides responses based on the initial query, the user ends the session voluntarily, or the communication continues for up to 2 days with no change in scope.
points.point4: Sessions are charged per challenge submitted.
points.point6: All payments are pre-paid. There is no refund unless Drishiq deviates significantly from the expected structure or fails to deliver any meaningful output.

paidSubscriptions.title: 1.7 Paid Subscriptions, Billing, and Pricing
paidSubscriptions.content: Each session covers a single problem statement. No two problem statements may be merged into one session. There are no additional costs beyond what is clearly stated for each session. Pricing is transparent and non-negotiable once displayed.

points.point1: Usage beyond allotted sessions may incur extra charges.
points.point2: Users must have active credits or pay per session before initiating service.
points.point3: Pricing is transparent and displayed before purchase.
points.point4: Renewals may occur automatically unless cancelled.
points.point5: Drishiq reserves the right to change pricing plans with notice.

dataRetention.title: 1.8 Data Retention & Analysis
dataRetention.content: Drishiq retains user session data for up to 24 months unless a deletion request is received earlier.

points.point1: Data may be used to enhance service performance, train diagnostic models, or generate aggregated insights.
points.point2: All use will align with anonymization standards and applicable privacy laws.

governingLaw.title: 1.9 Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.content: These Terms & Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.

webAppCovered.title: 2.1 Web App Covered by this Cookie Policy
webAppCovered.content: This Cookie Policy explains how Cookies are used on Drishiq.com and other websites operated by us from which you are accessing this Cookie Policy (collectively referred to as the "Sites"). This policy may be amended from time to time. When it is amended, we will update the "Last Updated" date accordingly.

whatAreCookies.title: 2.2 What are Cookies and Similar Technologies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help recognize your device, enhance navigation, remember preferences, and improve overall user experience. Some cookies help us learn which areas of our Sites are useful or need improvement.

typesOfCookies.title: 2.3 Types of Cookies Used on Our Sites

points.point1: Strictly Necessary Cookies: Essential for site navigation and secure access.
points.point2: Performance Cookies: Help us understand usage patterns and errors. Do not collect identifiable data.
points.point3: Functionality Cookies: Remember your preferences such as language, text size, region, and customizations.

managingCookies.title: 2.4 Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: You can manage or delete cookies using your browser settings or our Manage Preferences module. Doing so may impact site performance or feature availability.

scope.title: 3.1 Scope of this Policy
scope.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Drishiq collects, uses, shares, and protects your personal data across our websites and services. It applies to users of the Drishiq website/app and covers all services provided by us, unless stated otherwise.

points.point1: Directly provided information: Name, email, phone, demographic info, messages submitted, feedback, payment details.
points.point2: Automatically collected data: IP address, browser type, session data, usage metrics, crash reports, device type, OS, referring URL, interaction logs.
points.point3: Third-party data: Information from payment gateways, referral systems, marketing sources.

points.point2: To respond to support or service inquiries
points.point3: For security, compliance, and fraud prevention
points.point4: To send relevant content or notifications (with consent)
points.point5: To analyze usage and improve our platform
points.point6: For account authentication and system diagnostics

dataStorage.title: 3.4 Data Storage & Security
dataStorage.content1: We store your data securely using industry-standard encryption and access control. All data is stored in compliance with applicable laws. We retain personal data only as long as necessary or as required by law.
dataStorage.content2: In case of a data breach involving your personal data, we will notify affected users and authorities as required under applicable data protection regulations.

points.point1: Request access, correction, or deletion of your data at any time via email
points.point2: Opt out of marketing communications in case of paid users
points.point4: File a complaint with a data protection authority

childrenPrivacy.title: 3.6 Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Users under 18 require verified guardian consent. No services are knowingly offered to users under 13. If found, such accounts may be removed or restricted.
